entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming north 20 overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
